snippet: A federal judge threw out an earlier verdict, saying a forewoman had “polluted” the jury with remarks she overheard outside the courtroom.
abstract: Judge Stanwood Duval Jr of the Eastern District Court of Louisiana orders new trial for former BP engineer Kurt Mix, who was convicted of deleting text messages relevant to an investigation of the 2010 Gulf of Mexico oil spill; ruling finds that outside information influenced jury's verdict.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge threw out an earlier verdict, saying a forewoman had “polluted” the jury with remarks she overheard outside the courtroom.

headline.main: Former BP Engineer Wins New Trial in Case on Gulf Spill
